BlogEntry.Title: Thanks!
BlogEntry.Description: Thanks to Chris and Scoble for linking to me for our job opening.  I should be clear, the job is not working for me (I gave up all of my reports when I moved out to Boise for a while) but is for working on the Longhorn graphics team.  The job is to help develop APIs and functionality at one level above DX.  If you have any questions, please post a comment (if haloscan is up) or drop me a line at "Eightyprecent at Bedafamily.com".
